nodes.message: The Invoke command is to determine if Shawn is too high above the dam or if he is right next to it.

nodes.text: There's a dam constructed down below of all sorts of things piled up, but it's doing a good job of making a nice looking lagoon.
Now that we've seen the last of the sea serpent, I don't think that dam's serving any purpose.
I'm guessing that the Gogs deliberately constructed this dam so they could keep the Sea Serpent trapped. That's some backwards way to worship an animal, caging it so you can honor it.
Maybe this isn't such a good idea?
I'd need something big... probably several somethings big... to make any kind of dent in this dam. But at the moment, I don't have the firepower on me.
I'm going to guess that'll be enough bombs.
Considering the size of this dam, it may take more than just one Big Boom to break it up. Better not waste using just this one.
But I think I'm still gonna need another. Just to be sure.
... and just one more... just to be absolutely sure.
All right. I'm betting that'll be enough to blow this dam sky high!
I think that's enough bombs. I think three's going to be the magic number.
You know, with the Sea Serpent defeated. Blowing up this dam isn't going to set him free. Maybe I should take my booms and use them somewhere else.
I better use another bomb or two. I don't want to have to do this twice...
